text: 4:14 Jon 6:35; 6:58; 7:38Eghtɨ gumazim o amizir kɨ danɨngamin dɨpar kam amegham, an kuarim dughiatamɨn uam an pɨran kogham. Puvatɨ. Dɨpar kɨ danɨngamin kam, a dɨpam nguazir averiamɨn ikiava otivi moghɨn, an navir averiamɨn otivam. Egh dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdir kam otiv mamaghɨra ikɨva, zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim a danɨngam.”
